title: For LGBTQ+ people.
selftext:
Hello all,

A friend of mine is conducting a research project to better understand the unique experiences and challenges faced by LGBTQ+ individuals when relocating to a new city / travelling to a new place / in their current city. Your insights can help shape the development of tools and resources designed to support the community during such transitions for the research.

Here is the link to the survey, and it take approximately 2-5mins. 

Link: https://forms.gle/zHMsGWduQwMNaxe26

The participation is completely voluntary, and all your responses will remain confidential. Please feel free to share this survey with other LGBTQ+ individuals who might be interested in participating.

Thank you in advance for your time and for helping to contribute to a more supportive and understanding world for the LGBTQ+ community research.
